1.0.name: wordpress/bistri-video-call-button
1.0.description:
Bistri is free video calling solution. Fully Open, no need to register to call a Bister. Bistri runs in your browser, no need to install additional software or plugin.

The Bistri Video Call Button Widget allows you to add a "call me on Bistri" button on your blog. A presence indicator integrated to the button let your visitors know about your availability for a call.

A few options give you the possibility to customize the button appearance (size, label, presence, ...)
